SEARCH

Class HotelReservationSystem

java.lang.Object
HotelReservationSystem
public class HotelReservationSystem extends Object
The HotelReservationSystem is where the various hotels are stored. The frontend interacts with this to get info on hotels.

    • updateBasePrice

      public boolean updateBasePrice(Hotel hotel, double newBasePrice)
      updateBasePrice() changes the base price of a given hotel, so long as there are no reservations in the hotel and that the new price is >= 100.
      Parameters:
      hotel - Hotel to change base price of.
      newBasePrice - New price to set base price of hotel to.
      Returns:
      Success condition.

      Returns:
      True if a Hotel is successfully removed. False otherwise.
